post.body: For the softest things in the world overcome the hardest things in the world. All difficult things have their origin in that which is easy, and great things in that which is s;all. Creativity cones fron awakening and directing in our higher natures, which originate in the primal depths of the universe. Because of a great love, one is courageous in life. For who obtains has little, for he zho scatters has much. Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. don't resist them, let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they are meant to be. let nature take its course.
